creator: Asaraf Amir
descriptionHtml:
Colony commander is an indie text based game which let's you manage your own colony from it's very beginning to a powerful and dominating colony.

At first, you ill have to hire workers to operate your production units. Production units are powered by power plants and cost gold to build. Gold is produced by gold mines.

Colonies needs to protect themselves by building strong defenses to stop enemy attacks. In addition, you will have to build and operate large arsenal of attack units to initiate various of attacks on your enemies. Attack units required soldiers to operate them.

Take advantage of the natural resources around you and invest workers to mine them. Natural resources are valuable and worth a lot of gold. You can quick sell them for gold or trade them with devious traders around the world. They can also be used for research and development technologies. Natural resources can be traded with other colonies for gold or for other natural resources in the global market.

Complete missions to earn valuable crystals and supply crates. Supply crates can contain gold, attack units and special attack units.

Create or join clans to grow stronger and improve your dominance. Complete clan missions to earn crates.

The colony is part of a country. Workers and soldiers tax rates are determined by wars. Your colony gold balance will be influenced directly from it. Higher level colonies can initiate wars against other countries and weaken them. Once a war is declared all the country colonies should take active role in wining the war.

The world map offers information and different points of interests. Each country has information on tax rates and wars statistics. Also, pirates can be found. Attack them and gain reputation to avoid pirates attacks on your colony.
Want to earn some gold or crystals? visit the roulette and wheel of fortune. They can give you a big boost of gold. Visit devious natural resource traders around the world, they can offer great deals or can deceive you.

Experience a wide range of aspects in managing your own colony: economy, military, external affairs, wars and world adventures.
Start building your colony today!
descriptionShort: Manage your colony economy, military, external affairs and more...

title: Colony Commander - World Domination MMO War Game

creator: Asaraf Amir
descriptionHtml:
Step into the ultimate experience of MMO War games with Colony Commander. Capture and Manage colonies and build your own powerful empire. Colony Commander is the best MMO military game on a massive real world map, managing a real time strategy in the war zone. Build your army and join players from all over the world in the most challenging PVP and PVE combat! Fight your enemies, defend your colony, gather resources and plan brilliant strategies to defeat all resistance!

Mine Gold from gold mines and use it to build production units and hire workers to operate them. The production units work on energy from power plants. Hire workers to mine minerals and collect a lot of gold. Natural resources can be traded with other colonies for gold or for other natural resources in the global market.

Build up your defence to protect against enemy attacks. Hire soldiers and operate your large arsenal of attack units to initiate various attacks on your enemies.

Complete missions to earn valuable crystals and supply crates. Supply crates can contain gold, attack units and special attack units. Create or join clans to grow stronger and improve your dominance. Complete clan missions to earn crates.

The colony is part of a country. Workers and soldiers tax rates are determined by wars. Your colony gold balance will be influenced directly from it. Higher level colonies can initiate wars against other countries and weaken them. Once a war is declared all the country colonies should take active role in wining the war.

The world map offers information and different points of interests. Each country has information on tax rates and wars statistics. Also, pirates can be found. Attack them and gain reputation to avoid pirates attacks on your colony.

Features of Colony Commander - War Simulator
- The best multiplayer Battle game based on real time simulation
- Fight enemies and capture colonies in the best action game ever!
- Join multiple clans to build troops and improve skills & defence
- Build your own colony today in the Colony War Game!

Download Colony Commander and join the ultimate MMO strategy game experience! Survive the constant action of a never-ending, real time, multiplayer strategy game!

If you have any queries, issues, suggestions, or feedback feel free to drop us a message at amir.asaraf@gmail.com and we would get back to you as soon as possible.

Experience a wide range of aspects in leading your own colony: production, military, external affairs, wars and world adventures.

Create or join clans to grow stronger and improve your dominance. Complete clan missions to get prizes.

The colony is part of a country. Your colony gold balance will be influenced directly from it. Join global wars against other countries and weaken them. Once a war is declared all the country colonies should take active role in wining the war.

Experience a wide range of aspects in leading your own colony: production, military, external affairs, wars and world adventures.
Start building your colony today!

title: Colony Commander - World Domination MMO War Game

creator: Asaraf Amir
descriptionHtml:
Prepare for world domination! Gather your arsenal to train for the critical war and do what you must to win the tactical RPG battle challenges. As one of the best MMO Survival 4x games, this Commander game is designed to test your strategic and leadership skills. As the commander of your own colony, you must build and manage army men. You must collect strategy war essentials and look over all essential buildings to develop. Gather enough resources for survival, and build a strong army to secure your colony, outposts, and world explorations. With this epic battle simulator, you are sure to enter a realistic world ready to wage war,
Play Colony Commander: World Domination 4X Strategy MMO now!

Massive Strategy War 4X Games Adventure
This 4x massively multiplayer strategy war game allows you to create everything you need to grow your colony. Act as a responsible army men commander and build a powerful army of ground, naval, and air forces to attack other colonies. As you battle for dominance in this tactical RPG game, you can choose to fight pirates or rebels, attack player colonies, or explore various locations for resources. You will also want to take over outposts around the world to expand your dominance in the MMO survival adventure.

Gather Army Men and Command Task Forces
Prepare for the critical war and gather all the army men at your disposal. The more massive and powerful arsenal you build, the more chances of winning the strategy war you will have. Build attack units including army men from Strykers, Panthers, Falcons, and the mighty Kraken are ready to command.Join clans, make friends, populate outposts with clan members and help other members to win attacks over outposts around the map.Attack other player colonies or AI colonies including the Pirates and Rebels. Be tactical, be a leader and be victorious!


Design and Develop Tactical RPB Buildings
Utilize the biggest resource of tactical RPG buildings at your disposal. Develop buildings such as Gold Mine, Oil pump, Power plant, Research labs, Radar, Crystals mine, and Special forces center. The World map is populated with Rock formations, Power panels, Oil fields, Abandoned Colonies, and Volcanic tubes to explore. Find different types of Outposts and harvest resources. Make sure to defend them well as they are essential for MMO Survival! Research to unlock powerful Mining abilities, Damage bonuses, and new units through the tech tree of this epic battle simulator.


Gather Essentials to Win Epic Battle Simulator
Do not make the mistake of depending upon strategy war resources only. You must collect everything to win the critical war. Initiate wars with other countries or choose a piece. Diplomacy is vital for the country's colonies' future in the epic battle simulator. Hire captains and earn XP points for your captains to get damage bonuses and resources scavenging.

Features of Colony Commander: World Domination 4X Strategy MMO
Immersive 4X games MMO Survival adventure UI/UX
Build tactical RPG resources and develop your defenses
Complete your strategy war preparation and get ready for critical war
Partner with army men to build your arsenal, use diplomacy or be the commander to defend your strengths in epic battle simulator
Compete in daily events against players all over the world
One World, every player amongst millions of colonies, no more server selection.
Play with your friends, get on top of the leaderboard, become a chief commander of your country.

Download and play Colony Commander: World Domination 4X Strategy MMO today!
descriptionShort: Gather army men, prepare a strategy war plan and be victorious in critical war.
